name: Shi-Kuo Chang
content: Information about Captain SK Captain SK Professor Emeritus and Captain of Chronobot Department of Computer Science School of Computing and Information University of Pittsburgh Pittsburgh, PA 15260, U.S.A. E-mail: schang@pitt.edu Current Affiliation: President, KSI Research Inc. E-mail: shikuochang@yahoo.com About the Captain (To view Captain SK's grandchildren click on the photo of Captain SK performing the wedding ceremony for his PhD student Ms. YingZe Wang and CMU graduate Dr. Xi Chen on July 7, 2013) Technical Publications Patents and Inventions Chronobot: Device and method for time and knowledge exchange and management (Patent US7827067 issued November 2, 2010) FaceAlive Icons: Icons for animated emotional expressions (Technology Review Today, March 27, 2007) Smart Image System: (Patent US5974201 issued Oct 26, 1999) Recognition Elected to 2022 Twenty Most Popular Writers by a top literary journal in Taiwan A Special Issue in honor of Caption SK was published in Journal of Visual Languages and Computing, Vol. 38, 2017 The 2017 S K Chang Best Paper Award went to: Situated Analytics: Demonstrating immersive analytical tools with Augmented Reality by Neven A.
